response.overview: Life as a superheroine has prevented Sunder from having much of a love life. She finally tries online dating and nervously has coffee with a guy for the first time. Without divulging her secret identity, things start on a rocky note but quickly progress to a comfortable level. As Sunder is distracted by attraction, her date reveals his true colors. After dropping a roofie in her coffee and finishing her off with chloro, Sunder wakes much later to find her date has recorded her having a forced orgasm. He's cleverly set the film to automatically release to multiple social networks if he doesn't prevent the release process every 24 hours. Sunder finds herself in a very precarious situation and realizes ultimately, she'll have to acquiesce to the man's requests.
response.title: Paradox Reaction
